sentences.english: Demining or mine clearance is the process of removing either land mines, or naval mines, from an area.
sentences.chinese: 排雷或掃雷是從一個區域清除地雷或水雷的過程。

sentences.english: Leading that grand armada were the minesweepers.
sentences.chinese: 這支浩浩蕩蕩艦隊的先鋒是掃雷艦。

sentences.english: It is the only seagoing minesweeper operated by the PLA Navy.
sentences.chinese: 它是被PLA海軍操作的唯一適於遠航的掃雷艦。

sentences.english: Minesweeping is a famous puzzle game.
sentences.chinese: 掃雷是一款非常流行的益智遊戲。

sentences.english: To research shield material into minesweeper magnetic - protective clothing.
sentences.chinese: 探討掃雷艇磁場防護服屏蔽材料。

sentences.english: As a result the mine-sweep equipment has been missed.
sentences.chinese: 因此也就省掉了掃雷裝備。

sentences.english: I asked the new administration to continue our global demining effort for ten more years.
sentences.chinese: 我呼籲新政府將我們的全球掃雷工作再努力進行十年。

sentences.english: This training course represents another contribution made by China to the international humanitarian de-mining efforts.
sentences.chinese: 這是我國對國際人道主義掃雷事業的又一次重要貢獻。

sentences.english: What is meant with minesweeping and satisficing?
sentences.chinese: 掃雷與滿意度是什麼意思？

sentences.english: They just couldn't find any besides Solitaire and Minesweeper that they enjoyed in the game marketplace at that time.
sentences.chinese: 在那時他們除了紙牌遊戲和掃雷遊戲什麼也沒得玩。

sentences.english: Minesweeper was among the first to be added to the add-on.
sentences.chinese: 《掃雷》是第一批被加入附件中的程序之一。

sentences.english: If you have never played the Minesweeper game, here is a quick intro to it .
sentences.chinese: 如果你從未玩過掃雷遊戲，這裏是一個快速介紹給它。

sentences.english: The aim was to convoy a group of mine sweepers.
sentences.chinese: 目的就是爲一組掃雷艇護航。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: pattern matching (puzzle game)/matching (type of test question in which presented items are to be paired up)
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
(slang) to target an intoxicated person for sexual assault
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: sb who goes whichever way the wind blows/sb with no mind of their own/easily swayed person/opportunist
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
both sides are willing/by mutual consent
